li.label: ate ork meal
li.description: I had to eat a disgusting, fungal meal. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.

li.label: ate ork fungus
li.description: I ate some green, slimy fungus. It was, possibly, the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted.

li.label: ate cooked ork fungus
li.description: I ate a meal cooked from green, slimy fungus. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but there were glands and fluid pockets in there that I can't identify.
